properties.entry: Uuuuups - found an error - please don't pet! --> "%s"

I do not know anything about this: %s
There is nothing here! Why don't you consider updating your resources!
I do not know this user =(

I will be offline now. Will be back as soon as possible.
I am a little bot who helps you coordinate your guild better!
this command only work an the guild channel
unknown sub command [create, add, delete, list (default)]
This resource group is empty. Please add some materials to it like that: `group add %s [material] "[material with spaces in name]" ...`
I do not know this resource group: %s
I do not know this material: %s

Tell me the name of the group and the name of the resources to remove
